semantics.label: 動作設定
semantics.description: これらのオプションでタスクがどのように動作するかを制御できます。

fields.label: Enable "Retry" button
Enable "Show Solution" button
Question Type
fields.description: Select the look and behaviour of the question.

fields.label: Give one point for the whole task
fields.description: Enable to give a total of one point for multiple correct answers. This will not be an option in "Single answer" mode.

fields.label: Randomize answers
fields.description: Enable to randomize the order of questions on display.

fields.label: Require answer before the solution can be viewed
Disable image zooming for question image
Show confirmation dialog on "Check"
Show confirmation dialog on "Retry"
Automatically check answers
fields.description: Enabling this option will make accessibility suffer, make sure you know what you're doing.

fields.label: Pass percentage
fields.description: Percentage of Total score required for passing the quiz.
